original_text: Once when Zechariah’s division was on duty and he was serving as priest before God,
korean_text: 마침 사가랴가 그 반열의 차례대로 하나님 앞에서 제사장의 직무를 행할새

sentences.original_text: Once when Zechariah's division was on duty
and he was serving as priest before God
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 제사장으로서 하나님 앞에서 섬기고 있을 때
